shortcuts.name: Ping Something
shortcuts.description: Pings a user-defined host or IP.

shortcuts.name: Ping Google
shortcuts.description: Pings Google to check network connectivity.

shortcuts.name: IPConfig
shortcuts.description: Displays detailed network configuration.

shortcuts.name: List Running Processes
shortcuts.description: Displays a list of currently running processes.

shortcuts.name: Kill Process by Name
shortcuts.description: Forcefully terminates a specific process (e.g., Notepad).

shortcuts.name: Check Disk Usage
shortcuts.description: Checks the file system and disk for errors on drive C.

shortcuts.name: System Information
shortcuts.description: Displays detailed system information, including OS version and hardware details.

shortcuts.name: Check Network Connections
shortcuts.description: Displays all active network connections and listening ports.

shortcuts.name: Flush DNS Cache
shortcuts.description: Clears the DNS cache to resolve potential DNS-related issues.

shortcuts.name: Check Windows Updates
shortcuts.description: Forces Windows to check for updates immediately.

shortcuts.name: List User Accounts
shortcuts.description: Displays a list of all user accounts on the computer.

shortcuts.name: Enable Remote Desktop
shortcuts.description: Enables Remote Desktop access on the system.

shortcuts.name: Check Disk Space
shortcuts.description: Displays free and total disk space for all drives.

shortcuts.name: View Event Logs
shortcuts.description: Opens the Event Viewer to view system logs.

shortcuts.name: Power Off Computer
shortcuts.description: Shuts down the computer immediately.

shortcuts.name: Restart Computer
shortcuts.description: Restarts the computer immediately.

shortcuts.name: View System Boot Configuration
shortcuts.description: Displays the boot configuration data for the system.

shortcuts.name: Network Troubleshooting Report
shortcuts.description: Generates a wireless network troubleshooting report.

shortcuts.name: Disable Firewall
shortcuts.command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state off
shortcuts.description: Disables the Windows Firewall for all profiles.

shortcuts.name: Enable Firewall
shortcuts.command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state on
shortcuts.description: Enables the Windows Firewall for all profiles.

shortcuts.name: View System Uptime
shortcuts.description: Displays system uptime and other network statistics.

shortcuts.name: Enable Hibernate
shortcuts.description: Enables the hibernate feature on the system.

shortcuts.name: Disable Hibernate
shortcuts.description: Disables the hibernate feature on the system.

shortcuts.name: List Installed Drivers
shortcuts.description: Displays a list of installed drivers and their details.

shortcuts.name: Scan System Files
shortcuts.description: Scans and repairs corrupted system files.

shortcuts.name: Check Power Efficiency
shortcuts.description: Generates a report on the system's energy efficiency.

shortcuts.name: Generate Battery Report
shortcuts.description: Generates a detailed battery usage report.

shortcuts.name: Display Active Network Interfaces
shortcuts.description: Displays the status of all active network interfaces.

shortcuts.name: Update Pihole
shortcuts.description: Uses SSH to update pihole

shortcuts.name: Sound Manager (Control Panel)
shortcuts.description: Opens the old style control panel sound manager
